response.content:
Hi Inger,

If you watch the introduction and first videos you will see that I did not mention anything about any framework because we do not use any. It's all built from scratch. The course has lots of explanation so not sure what you are actually referring to. There are exercise files available for download, but I'm not sure what you mean about 'no documentation' ?

results.content:
This review is not all for this course as i have not really finished the course yet. I have a few courses from Sebastian Sulinski and since i enjoyed the first one ( https://www.udemy.com/ecommerce-website/ ) i bought the rest of them. 
I am a programming enthusiast especially php and i was frustrated by the fact that most courses out there are nothing more than beginner courses and i wanted to move on. Sebastian teaches not the basics but how to actually use php to create some complicated and interactive web applications. 
All i really want to ask of him is to boost the volume of the audio and explain a bit more the reason why.
ps. I would love to see you create a simple social media website where users can register, connect and maybe share some things.
results.content_html:
